Adilia is asking for a loan in order to obtain a degree in psychology.  She needs to take a course that will help her reach this goal and that will guarantee a more prosperous future for her family.  She also receives support from her mother.  She is confident that with this loan she will be able to apply for new job offers which will guarantee better income for her family and that will also allow her to be a high quality professional.

loans.use: to obtain a degree in psychology.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing for women and children.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is a 29-year-old woman living with her two children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a pot store, in which he sells plastic utensils and crockery items such as plates, dishes, cups, jars, glasses, jugs, mugs, cauldrons, and buckets. Because he has only one source of income, he has to sustain their utility bills and household expenses alone.

Fozia's husband wants to buy more inventory to sell because most of his female customers want to purchase utensils in large quantities for household usage. More inventory is required to cope with the sudden increase in demand.

Therefore, Fozia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy more merchandise like plastic pots to sell and generate more income. Fozia is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan because they showed her husband a beam of hope to fulfill his desires.

loans.use: to buy utensils such as plates, dishes, cups, jars, glasses, jugs, mugs, and buckets for reselling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Ayélé est une femme âgée de 29 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur, mère de famille. Ayélé travaille comme coiffeuse et revendeuse depuis 2010. Elle vend des mèches, des tissages et des chaussures pour tous clients dans son atelier. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir satisfaire tous ses clients. Ayélé a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des mèches, des tissages et des chaussures. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. Dans les prochaines années, Ayélé voudrait développer son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer l’éducation de sa famille.
texts.en: Ayélé is a 29 year old woman. She is married to a reseller, with whom she has children. She has worked as a hairdresser and reseller since 2010. She sells hair extensions, weaves and shoes for all types of customers from her studio. She purchases these goods from Lomé. She works alone. Currently her biggest challenge is to satisfy her customers' demands; for this reason she is seeking a third loan from WAGES in order to purchase extensions, weaves and shoes. She would like to reinvest in the business, and in the coming years she would like to grow her enterprise. With the profits that she generates, she would like to ensure her family's education.

loans.use: To buy hair extensions, weaves and shoes.

loans.name: Clément

texts.fr: Afin d’aménager sa salle de peinture de voitures, mr Clément âgée de 35ans fait son second crédit à WAGES. Il est peintre auto. Il désire avec ce profit ouvrir une autre garage et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille(Il est marié et père de 03 enfants).
texts.en: In order to relocate his car painting studio, Mr Clement, who is 35 years old is seeking his second loan from WAGES. He paints cars for a living. He wishes to use the profits generated in order to open another garage and meet his family's needs (he is a married father of three children).

loans.use: to buy a compression device for painting cars.

loans.name: Patricio

texts.es:
Patricio tiene 51 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos menores hijos, los cuales uno cursan secundaria en colegio nacional del Distrito de Pomahuaca. Patricio vive por más de 28 años en dicho caserio que está ubicado en la parte rural del distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz. Dicho distrito está ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Patricio es el cultivo y venta de cacao, la venta lo realiza en el distrito de Pomahuaca. Cuenta con 16 años dedicándose a este rubro, además cliente se dedica al cultivo de arroz mediante arriendos, ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el crédito sin ningún problema. El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio de cultivo y venta de cacao con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.
texts.en:
Patricio is 51 years old, lives in his own home made of rustic materials with his wife and two young children, one of whom is in high school in Pomahuaca district. Patricia has lived for more than 28 years on this ranch located in a rural part of the district but does have light and water service. The district is located in Jaen province, Cajamarca region in northern Peru.

Patricio grows and sells cocoa. He sells his product in Pomahuaca district. He has had this business for 16 years. He also grows rice which provides additional income, enabling him to pay his loan without any problem. The loan will be used to invest in the growing and selling of cocoa as this is what generates the most income and in this way he will be able to improve his quality of life. In the area there isn't a lot of competition so he gets very good prices.

loans.use: to invest in growing and selling cocoa.

loans.name: Kanayim

texts.ru: Канайым успешно погасила предыдущий кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Канайым работает на том же месте и занимается сельским хозяйством. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Канайым есть 4 коровы и земельный надел мерою 0,50 Га арендованной и 1,05 Га собственной земли, где Канайым выращивает кукурузу, рис, клевер и ячмень для реализации. Ее совокупный ежемесячный доход доходит до 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Канайым обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух коров. Полученный доход от кредита позволит Канайым отремонтировать ее дом.
texts.en: Kanayim successfully repaid a previous loan, using it for what she said she would. She is grateful to Kiva and all those who helped her with financing. Kanayim is working at the same place and still working in agriculture. Currently, Kanayim has four cows and land which measure 0.50 hectares. She also has leased 1.05 hectares of private land where Kanayim grows corn, rice, barley and clover. Her total monthly income is 20,000 KGS. In order to further develop her business, Kanayim approached the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan of 70,000 KGS to buy two cows. The revenue from the loan will allow Kanayim to renovate her house.

loans.use: purchase two cows in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Ynus

texts.ru: Юнус родился 28 марта  1989 года  в  кишлаке   Ниджани   города  Истаравшана   Согдийский  области. Женат и имеет двух детей. У него свой дом. Он  занимается животноводством более трех  лет. В животноводстве ему помогает жена. Кроме этого он занимается земледелием. В дехканском хозяйстве  «Зартеппа» у него есть 1,5 гектара земли, из них 0,5 гектара земли для винограда и   1,0 гектар для выращивания лука. В свободное время он под подрабатывает работая столяром-плотником, что приносит дополнительный доход в его семью. Он хочет получить кредит для покупки скота, чтобы откормить и продать за более высокую цену.Он заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Ynus was born on 28 March 1989 in the village Nidzhani, near the city of Istravshan in the Sughd region. He is married and has two children. He has his own house. He has been working in animal husbandry for more than three years. His wife helps him. In addition, he farms. On a farm called Zarteppa,  he has 1.5 hectares of land, of which 0.5 hectares of land is a vineyard and 1.0 hectares is for growing onions. In his spare time, he works as a carpenter to bring in additional income. He wants to get a loan to buy cattle to fatten and sell for a higher price. He thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 45-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two daughters and three sons.

Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for many years. For many days now, his rickshaw has not been working properly. He uses it regularly, and he feels that most of its parts are worn out.

Because he is unable to generate any income now, he wants to buy a new auto rickshaw. However due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of a new rickshaw.

Therefore, Parveen has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Parveen is so very thankful to Kiva and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 39 year old woman residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of two daughters and one son. 

Her husband has been running a crockery store (utensils sale) for many years and he is the only one responsible for feeding the entire family. Shazia is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because her husband needs to purchase different types of crockery (i.e;  jugs, glasses, plates, dinner sets, etc.) This loan will help her husband to purchase these items for reselling purposes so that he can earn maximum profit and increase his daily sales. He can also use the profit as savings to fulfill any future needs.

Shazia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy crockery to sell.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia es soltera, no tiene hijos y vive con su prima en La Paz en una incomoda casa de adobe donde pagan un elevado alquiler, pero al menos tienen luz, agua y alcantarillado. Silvia se gana la vida como protesista pero esta muy enferma y necesita un prestamo para tratamiento medico Silvia no recibe ayuda de nadie, su prima colabora solo con gastos de la casa, por eso necesita su ayuda, Silvia necesita estar sana para trabajar más.
texts.en:
Silvia is single and does not have any children. She lives with her cousin in La Paz in an uncomfortable adobe house, where they pay a high rent but at least they have electricity, water, and sewerage. Silvia makes a living as a prosthetist, but she is very sick and needs a loan to pay for medical treatment. 

Silvia does not receive help from anybody; her cousin only contributes to household expenses. For this reason, she needs your help. Silvia needs to be healthy in order to continue working.

loans.use: to pay for medical treatment.

loans.name: Shehzadi's Group

texts.en:
Shehzadi is a 42-year-old married women. She is the mother of two sons and three daughters. Her husband is a government employee.

She has started a fabric business at her home. She wants to support her family through her business. She purchases a variety of fabrics from different areas, sews them into bed sheets, and sells them at a profitable price in the main market.

Presently she needs to purchase some fabrics to continue her business. However due to lack of financing, she is facing a problem. Therefore, she has requested a loan from Kiva and its partner BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to sew into bed sheets to sell.

loans.name: Elsa Nora

texts.es: Elsa de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace  10 años, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para surtir la tienda como: golosinas, granos básicos, huevos, azúcar, sopas, refrescos, etc. todo por mayor para poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Elsa is 31 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her two children. She has had a small store located in her house for 10 years. She has a lot of clients due to her variety of products. She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise to stock her store like sweets, basic grains, eggs, sugar, soup, soft drinks, etc. wholesale so that she can have higher profits.

loans.use: to buy sweets, basic grains, eggs, sugar, soup, soft drinks, etc. wholesale.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra en la fotografía, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Teresa, 37 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and her daughter. She works growing corn. When her harvest is ready, she stocks it in the granaries shown in the photograph. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc to be able to continue with her crops and therefore have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Mampi

texts.en:
Mampi is a 38-year-old, energetic and optimistic entrepreneur from Maynaguri, who believes that hard work has its own reward. She is married and the mother of three children (one son and two daughters), who are students. She is married to Sanjay, age 37 years old. He has a garments business set up. His garments business is running successfully, but he needs more money to expand his business in a fruitful way. He is seeking help to secure his family's and children’s future. And here, Mampi stands with her husband to help him grow his business in a wider manner. 

Mampi wants to take out a loan from Kiva through their field partner Belghoria Janakalyan Samity. Extra income will satisfy their family’s needs. Mampi’s first priority is her children's education. She wants to provide better education for their bright future. She will use this loan to improve and expand her husband's business. She dreams that the extra income will improve their standard of living in the future, and also she wants to provide better education for her children.

Mampi is thankful to her lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: To purchase garments for her husband's business.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es: Maria de 59 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, el mayor de ellos trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos (queso y crema), desde hace 8 años, tiene muchos clientes pues el producto es muy buenos y los precios son accesibles, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de leche por mayor para poder continuar con la elaboración de los alimentos y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria, 59 years old, lives with her husband and their two children. The eldest of them works and helps her economically. She has been working making dairy products (cheese and cream) for the past 8 years. She has many customers; the products are very good and the prices are accessible. Maria is applying for a loan for the purchase of milk in bulk to be able to continue with making the food and therefore have better income.

loans.use: to buy milk in bulk.

loans.name: Jeanne Violeta

texts.es:
Jeanne Violeta tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa familiar, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Jeanne Violeta se dedica a la venta de ceviche en su domicilio, desde hace 3 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte delantera de su domicilio; ella solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo; compra de pescado, papas, cebolla, para poder realizar una mayor cantidad de ceviche para poder cubrir toda la demanda que tiene, el préstamo le ayudará para tener una mayor inversión, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio, mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jeanne Violeta is 35 years old, single, doesn't have children, and lives in a rural area of Oyotun district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region in northern costal Peru. People in her region generally work in agriculture, livestock and business.

Jeanne Violeta sells ceviche from her home. She has had this business for 3 years. She seeks a loan for working capital so she can buy fish, potatoes, and onions to make a large quantity of ceviche to be able to meet the demand that she has. The loan will help her make a greater investment in her business with the goal of growing the business, improve her income, increase her earnings, resulting in a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fish, potatoes, onion to make ceviche.

loans.name: Claudia Marisol

texts.es: Claudia de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su padre, ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino desde hace 5 años, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de una vaca para seguir con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Claudia, 30 years old, lives in her own house with her father. She has been making a living raising cattle for the past 5 years. She sells her products in different markets. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of a cow to continue with the raising and therefore have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Maria de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años su principal siembra es el maíz y yuca, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así poder tener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Maria, 31 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their two children. She has been working in agriculture for the past 10 years. Her main crops are corn and yuca. She sells her products around the area. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc. and therefore will be able to have better income to have a better life along with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Graciela Edis

texts.es: Graciela de 39 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura  desde hace 12 años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la vende en los pueblos aledaños y tiene mucha clientela, ella esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Graciela, 39 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two children. She has been making a living in agriculture for the past 12 years. When her harvest is ready, she sells it in the surrounding villages and has a large clientele. She is applying for a loan to be able to buy the necessary supplies like: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc. and therefore be able to have better income to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheet metal and beams and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cellphones, cases, chargers, earphones and more accessories in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more natural medicine in bulk.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma de 45 años de edad tiene un puesto en el mercado municipal de venta de plátanos, desde hace 20 años se dedica a esa actividad que le genera buenos ingresos, vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas plátanos por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Vilma, 45, has a spot in the municipal market selling plantains. She has been dedicated to this activity for the past 20 years, which generates good income for her. She lives in her own house with her three children. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of more plantains in bulk to be able to continue with her sales and therefore obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy more plantains in bulk.

loans.name: Ayde

texts.es: Ayde tiene 59 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 10 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos del hogar, Ayde está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal para seguir con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ayde is 59 years old and lives in her own home with her partner and her daughter. She has sold tortillas for 10 years. Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers. From the sales, she is able to settle some household expenses.

Ayde requests a loan to buy wholesale corn and powdered lime, so that she can continue selling and therefore earn a greater income.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and powdered lime

loans.name: Santos Jamaniel

texts.es:
Santos Jamaniel tiene 55 años de edad, tiene 1 hija menor. Vive en casa propia junto a su conyuge, el caserio cuenta con luz y agua. Se encuentra a 30 minutos de Morropon. Él es natural de la zona. La comunidad es pequeña los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado y a la agricultura prinicpalmente Platano. Dicha comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Santos Jamaniel es la venta de productos de primera necesidad, cerveza y otros, el negocio tiene más de 6 años de experiencia, tiene clientela ya establecida. Además Santos Jamaniel percibe otros ingresos mensuales como docente a la fecha es nombrado. Solicita crédito para invertir en su tienda de abarrotes, cuya finalidad es aumentar y diversificar su stock de productos lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas, mejorar sus ingresos, sus ganancias y por ende obtendrá también una mejora en su calidad de vida y la de sus familia.
texts.en:
Santos Jamaniel is 55 years old and has one school-age daughter. He lives in his own house together with his wife; the rural community has access to electricity and running water. It is located at 30 minutes from Morropon. He is a native from this area. The community is small and its inhabitants work in cattle raising and agriculture, mainly growing bananas. The community is located in the district of Buenos Aires, Morropon province, Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru. 
Santos Jamaniel's occupation is the sale of basic commodities, beer and other goods. The business has more than 6 years of experience, and has already established a clientele. In addition, Santos Jamaniel receives additional income as a teacher; he is currently appointed as one. He requests a loan to invest in his grocery store, with the goal to increase and diversify his stock of products. This will allow him to increase his sales, improve his income and his profits, and finally improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in his grocery store with the goal to  increase and diversify his stock of products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a 6 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es:
Agustina tiene 31 años de edad, es casada, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Agustina se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral tales comopatos, gallinas, cuyes entre otros, hace 02 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo; compra de cerdos, cuyes, patos, gallinas; el préstamo le ayudará para tener una mayor inversión, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Agustina is 31 years old, married, has one son, and lives in her own home in a rural area of Oyotun, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. People in her community generally work in farming, livestock and business.

Agustina raises and sells farm animals such as ducks, chickens, guinea pigs and other animals. She has had this business for 2 years and it is located at her home. She seeks a loan to buy pigs, guinea pigs, ducks and chickens. In this way she will be able to expand her business and meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy pigs, guinea pigs, ducks and chickens.

loans.name: Asma's Group

texts.en:
Asma is a 30-year-old lady. She is very devoted to her husband who earns a very low income. He provides services for constructing houses. Most of his work depends on receiving contracts, and many times he is unable to get contracts for construction services. 

Recently her husband has gotten a huge contract, but he does not have enough construction supplies to provide proper services. Asma has requested a loan so that her husband will be able to buy more materials to provide his best services.
 
Asma is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan. She is hopeful that Kiva lenders take pity on her and support her in this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un negocio de venta de ropa ubicado en el mercado municipal en una zona muy transitada, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la calidad del producto, la joven vive en casa propia con sus padres, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder surtir mas su negocio y asi poder tener mejores ingresos y tener junto con sus padres una mejor vida.
texts.en:
The young woman who has her face pixelated is 22 years old.  She lives in a high risk area.  She has a business selling clothes at the municipal market.  It is in a heavily traveled area.  She has a lot of customers because of the good prices and the quality of the product.  She lives in her own house with her parents.

She is requesting a loan to buy more clothes wholesale in order to be able to stock her business more.  This way she will be able to have better earnings and a better life together with her parents.

loans.use: to buy more clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Rita Del Carmen

texts.es: Rita de 52 años de edad habita en vivienda propia al lado de su esposo desde hace 20 años. Ella es una mujer que se caracteriza por su tenacidad para el trabajo, ya que desde muy pequeña ha tenido que trabajar duro para salir adelante, actualmente se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos y bebidas frías y calientes, las que vende en su cantón en un lugar céntrico donde la afluencia de personas es muy buena. Rita desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su esposo por lo que desea colocar ladrillo de piso y repellar las paredes de su vivienda, para lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, ladrillo de piso, arena, grava para colocar ladrillo de piso y repellar las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rita is 52 has been living with her husband for 20 years in their own home. She is a woman who is characterised by tenacious efforts in her work, as she has had to work hard since she was very small to succeed. She currently works selling typical food and hot and cold drinks, which she sells in her canton in a central place where there is a good flow of people.

Rita wants to improve their housing conditions, so she plans to lay a brick floor and to plaster the walls of their house. Therefore, she is asking for a loan through FUSAI to invest in plastering the walls of their house, as well as cement, a brick floor, sand and gravel for laying the brick floor.

loans.use: to invest in plastering the walls of her house, cement, a brick floor, sand and gravel for laying the brick floor.

loans.name: Archana

texts.en:
Archana is a 36-year-old woman, who has one son and lives in the village of Madhya Khagrabari in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. Archana’s husband has a small business. Her son now reads in grade 4. Due to poor economic conditions, Archana and her husband are not able to cover their family's expenses. 

Archana always worries about the condition of her family and wants to do something for the sake of her son and husband. So she set up her own business to serve her family better and for the future betterment of her only son. Archana supplies milk to her neighbors and the local market too. There has been increased demand for milk in the market, which pushes to Archana to buy another dairy cow.

So, Archana and her husband decided to take out a loan from Kiva lenders via Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to purchase a dairy cow to expand their business of animal husbandry. An extra cow will provide her with a lot of reasonable profit. She will be able to produce more milk and increase her sales volume. The decision makes Archana more comfortable about the future of her family and about how to secure the future of her son.

Archana gives heartiest thanks to Kiva and BJS for making their future secure.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her animal husbandry.

loans.name: Qorihuayrachina Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “QORIHUAYRACHINA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maritza ella es casada y tiene 28 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de agricultura, la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y gallinas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “QORIHUAYRACHINA” communal bank.  This bank is located in the Cinchero district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Maritza, age 28, is married and has two children.  She works in her business of raising and selling animals.  She also devotes herself to agriculture.  She raises guinea pigs and chickens.  She makes them grow and fattens them.  Then she sells them a the different fairs.  Through this small business she gets her children ahead.  Her dream is to have a place where she is able to sell the guinea pigs and chickens.  She is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and feed for these animals.

The other members work at businesses selling candy, selling clothes, a grocery store, and a restaurant business.

The member is grateful to those who form part of this dream in this way.  She pledges to make her payments according to the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and feed for these animals.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es: Jenny es madre soltera, cuyo trabajo se basa en la elaboración de artesanías entre las cuales están principalmente  esculturas, cuadros y muñecas de adorno . Gracias a esta actividad a logrado salir adelante con las obligaciones familiares,su deseo es mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de ella como la de su hijo, por esta razón necesita un préstamo de ochocientos mil colones (¢800.000), dinero que usará en la compra de materiales necesarios para confeccionar mayor cantidad de productos y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio y por ende aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Jenny is a single mother. Her work is based on making handicrafts amongst which are principally sculptures, frames and decorative dolls. Thanks to this work she can get ahead with her family obligations. Her wish is to improve her quality of living and that of her son. So she is requesting a loan of ¢800,000 CRC. This money will be used to make a greater quantity of products and doing this her business will grow and in the end increase her income.

loans.use: to invest in materials for her handicraft workshop.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
As a married mother of eight children, Carmelita works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from a general store. Carmelita is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Carmelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Gayrat

texts.ru: Гайрат уроженец кишлака Ниджани  города  Истаравшана   Согдийской области. Ему 46 лет. Женат и имеет двоих детей. Он родился в семье дехкан. В дехканском хозяйстве  «Мафтункули»  имеет 2,0 гектара земли,  из них 0,5 гектара винограда,1,5 гектара для выращивания овощей и корма для скота. У него есть корова и баран. Работая мастером он приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Он заранее благодарит МДО Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en: Gayrat is a resident of the village of Nidjani near the city of Istaravshan in the Sogdiski region. He is 46 and married with two children. He was born to a family of farmers and his farm, called "Maftunkuli", is 2.0 hectares in size: 0.5 hectares of vineyards and 1.5 hectares where he grows vegetables and feed for his livestock (he has a cow and a ram). He also earns extra money working as a handyman. He thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Saraswati Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
Manju is 44 years old. She is married and has five children. One of her daughters is married and the other four are studying. Her husband is a mason. Manju has been running a small kerosene shop and also has a goat rearing farm. She has six goats on her farm. With this loan, she is able to help her husband with the household costs as his monthly income is not sufficient to maintain the family.

Manju is the group leader of “Saraswati Mahila Samuha”. The group consists of four other women. Manju is requesting a loan to buy wood, metal sheeting, and nails to repair the roof of her house as her house leaks during heavy rains. The other members are also seeking a loan to improve their livelihood. 

Your loan will help these five women to improve their standard of living and give better education to their children.

loans.use: to buy wood, metal sheeting, and nails to repair the roof of her house

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa vive en concubinato desde hace 15 años y tiene 5 hijos Luisa y su familia han sido acogidos por su hermana, la casa esta en El Alto, es de ladrillo y cemento y tiene luz, agua y alcantarillado. Luisa tiene el duro oficio de ser ayudante de chofer, tiene que corear las rutas, recibir pasajeros y manejar el dinero de los pasajes, a tiempo de que no se ajusta un cinturón de seguridad mientras el minibus va en movimiento (por cierto, los minibuses son incomodos en Bolivia) Pero al menos hay algo bueno, el minibus es de propiedad de Luisa, ella quiere un credito para pagar mantenimiento de movilidad, la pareja de Luisa es conductor de la movilidad
texts.en: Luisa has been living with her partner for 15 years and has 5 children. Luisa and her family have been taken in by her sister. The house is situated in El Alto, is made of bricks and has electricity, running water and access to sewage services. Luisa has the hard job of being a bus driver's assistant, she has to call out the routes, welcome passengers and manage the fare payments, and at the same time she doesn't wear a safety belt while the minibus is moving (minibuses are certainly uncomfortable in Bolivia). But at least there is an upside: the minibus belongs to Luisa, and she requests a loan to pay for the servicing of her vehicle. Luisa's partner is the driver of the vehicle.

loans.use: to service her vehicle

loans.name: Lindaura

texts.es:
Lindaura tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera, sin hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Lindaura se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, huevos, menestras, etc; con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su domicilio; ella solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de más mercadería(arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros), dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, con gran influencia en el negocio; Lindaura piensa tener mayor cantidad y variedad de stock de sus productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona. De esta forma aumentar sus ventas, mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lindaura is 25, single, without children. She lives with her family in a rural zone of the Oyotún district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque province, northern coast of Peru. Her community is basically dedicated to agriculture, animal husbandry and trade.

Lindaura works selling groceries like rice, sugar, milk, oil, eggs, lentils, etc. with more than 2 years of experience in the business. It is located in her home. She is applying for a loan for working capital, to purchase more merchandise (rice, sugar, oil, among others). Said investment will serve her to increase her sales, with a big influence on the business. Lindaura wants to have more quantity and variety of stock of her products to be able to tend to the diverse needs, requirements and tastes of the customers of the area. In this manner, she will increase her sales, improve her income, increase her earnings and, therefore, improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Namita

texts.en:
Namita, a 36-year-old housewife, only wants to increase her family's income for the smooth running of daily life. Namita has three children (two daughters and one son). Two of the children are students in grade 7 and grade 5, respectively. The third one is below school-going age. Namita is illiterate and can only sign her name. 

Namita’s husband is the key bread earner for their family, and by pulling a rickshaw, he tries to provide enough income to run his family successfully. To increase his income, they are thinking of buying one rickshaw for him, but the only constraint is enough funds. So they decided to take out a loan from Kiva via Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to improve their daily income by pulling a rickshaw every day.

Namita is giving thanks to BJS and Kiva for providing a sustainable asset, which will not only help them at present but in the near future also. A fruitful investment will make Namita and her family happy and relaxed, and they will be capable of saving something for themselves and for their children’s future.

loans.use: To purchase a rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Husniya

texts.ru: Хусния  родилась в горном Шахристане в семье дехканина. Ей 36 лет. Хусния замужем и имеет 2х детей. У неё любящий муж и дружная семья.  Они стараются воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми. Они живут в доме который построили сами. Хусния занимается торговлей более 10 лет и знает все тонкости своего дела. Она продаёт женскую и детскую одежду. Для перевозки товара ей нужен собственный автомобиль. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом.  Она заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Husniya was born in Shahristan, a mountainous region [of Tajikistan], in a farmer's family. She is 36 years old. Husniya is married and has two children. She has a loving husband and a close-knit family. Husniya and her husband try to bring up their children to become good persons. They live in a house they built on their own. Husniya has been working as a vendor for over 10 years and knows all aspects of this business well. She sells women's and children's clothing. She needs a personal car in order to transport her merchandise. This is why she has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan. She thanks MDO Arvand for support in advance.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Bimala

texts.en:
Bimala is a 48-year-old rural woman of Maynaguri, Jalpaiguri district. She lives with her husband and son in her own small house. She is a hardworking woman. She is illiterate, but she can sign her name.

Her husband, 49-year-old Kailash, is a mason by profession. His income is not sufficient to run his family properly. For that reason, Bimala got involved in a livestock business to help her husband financially. But now she wants to start a new business of milk supply to generate more income. She sells milk to her neighbors because there is a high demand for milk in their locality. So she wants to purchase a dairy cow. Thus, she applied for a loan to Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (Kiva’s partner). Bimala hopes that the loan will help her to increase her income. 

Bimala thanks her lenders for their help.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to start a new business of milk supply.

loans.name: Edder

texts.es:
Edder tiene 31 años, es soltero. Vive en casa de sus padres junto a ellos. Su familia habita en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura, ganaderia y crinza y comercio de aves de corral. Dicha comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Edder se dedica a brindar el servicio mototaxi desde hace 05 años y además también se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales(patos, cerdos. Edder solicita préstamo para realizar la compra de un mayor número y mayor variedad de animales para negociar, animales como pollos, gallinas, pavos, entre otros. Ya que desea invertir más en este rubro porque el Mercado presenta perpectivas favorables para este rubro. Con la inversión Edder ofrecerá una mejor atención a sus clientes, ya que podrá complacer todos los gustos y preferencias de estos; otorgándo una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Edder is 31 years old and is single. He lives together with his parents in their house. His family lives in a community that is dedicated to trade, agriculture, livestock production and the breeding and sale of poultry. This community is located in the Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. 
Since 5 years, Edder earns a living by offering a mototaxi service. Additionally, he breeds and sells animals (ducks, pigs). Edder requests a loan to purchase a larger number and variety of animals to sell; animals such as young chicken, hens, turkeys amongst others. He would like to invest more in this enterprise because there are favorable market conditions in this sector. With the investment, Edder will give his clients greater attention, since he will be able to meet all their tastes and preferences. Thus, he will grant his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater number and variety of animals to trade.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo ambos trabajan y le ayudan en las casa, ella se dedica a la venta de joyería (aritos, cadenas, pulseras) desde hace 10 años, su negoció está ubicado en su casa, pero también vende de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la calidad de los productos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas joyería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Teresa is 53 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and son, who both work an help her around the house. She has been selling jewelry (earrings, necklaces, bracelets). for 10 years. Her business is located in her home, but she also sells as a vendor in different markets. She has many customers for her good prices and quality products. She is seeking a loan to buy more jewelry at wholesale as this is her only source of income and in this way she will be able to have greater earnings.

loans.use: to buy jewelry at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soups, sugar, coffee, candy, basic grains, soda pop, etc. at wholesale.

loans.name: Hira

texts.en:
32-year-old Hira is a married woman of Maynaguri. She is blessed with one son. She lives in the small village of Anandanagar in Jalpaiguri district. She is married to 47-year-old Dipak. Their son reads in grade 11.

Hira and her husband have a grocery business. Their main customers are their neighbors and the local people. The income generated from their business is insufficient to cover all household expenses with the cost of their son’s education. So they want to grow their business to generate more profit. Thus, they decided to take out a loan from Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (Kiva’s partner) to purchase more variety of grocery items for their grocery shop. They hope that the loan will help them to generate more profit from their business. Hira’s dream is to provide better education and better schooling for her son. 

They convey their hearty thanks to the lenders for this financial assistance.

loans.use: To purchase more variety of grocery items for their grocery shop.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, a 54-year-old married mother of three from Leyte, Philippines, makes a living through her sari-sari or variety store, selling various goods and items to the people in her area. She has been in the business for more than 10 years now. 

Maria wants to expand her store, and so is requesting a loan from CEVI to buy more stocks to sell such as canned goods, noodles, rice, dried fish, processed meat, vegetables, fruits, cooking oil and condiments. In the future, she hopes to make her business more sustainable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell such as canned goods, noodles, rice, dried fish, processed meat, etc.

loans.name: Gerardo Francisco

texts.es: Don Gerardo es padre de 4 hijos, desea desarrollar su propio negocio, que consiste en la venta de artículos para fiesta y juegos de pólvora , está actividad es bastante rentable en la época navideña, ya que estos productos son de gran demanda en las celebraciones de fin y principio de año , oportunidad que don Gerardo aprovechará desde ya , por lo cual necesita  un préstamo de un millón de colones (1.000.000) que invertirá en la compra de dicha mercadería , esto le permitirá colaborar con las obligaciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Gerardo is the father of 4 children. He wants to develop his own business selling party supplies and fireworks. This is a lucrative business in the holiday season because the products are in high demand for celebrations at the end and beginning of the year.

Gerardo wants to take advantage of this opportunity, which is why he requests a loan of 1 million colones. He will use the loan to buy the merchandise mentioned, which will allow him to contribute to his family’s financial obligations.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for holiday seasons

loans.name: Gladis Yamilex

texts.es:
Cuerpos ensangrentados, torceduras, golpes, Gladys lo ha visto todo en la medicina, a sus 40 años se dedica como enfermera, quien hace más de tres décadas comenzó como brigadista de salud, ahora es una enfermera profesional (Técnico superior), su trabajo lo aprendió empíricamente dado a las circunstancias que se encontraba el país en ese momento,  la manera en que ayudo a curar a todos esos soldados la motivo a seguir ayudando a las personas. Ha tenido la oportunidad de culminar sus estudios y desarrollar lo que una vez aprendió empíricamente. Ahora que está casada y es madre de dos hijos, desea poder brindarle lo mejor, de esta manera podrá aspirar a nuevas ofertas laborales o implementarse en la docencia.
Gladys espera graduarse y seguir ayudando a otros, sus planes a futuros son poder sacar una maestría en docencia para enseñar lo que ha aprendido, o desarrollarse en la salud pública  para mejorar la salud, así como el control y la erradicación de las enfermedades de esta manera solicita un crédito para el pago de los aranceles educativos, gastos de titulación y graduación, deposita su confianza en que podrá obtener estos beneficios y poder ser una profesional de calidad.
texts.en: Bloody bodies, sprains, wounds, Gladys has seen it all in medicine while working as a nurse. At 40 years old, she has began three decades ago as a volunteer and now is a professional nurse. She learned her work empirically due to the circumstances of her country, helping heal all the soldiers which motivated her to continue helping others. She has had the opportunity to finish her studies and formalize that which she had only learned by practice. Now she is married and mother of 2 children to whom she wants to provide the best so that they can aspire to careers. Gladys hopes to graduate and continue helping others. Her future plans are to be able to get a graduate degree in teaching to be able to teach what she has learned, or study public health, focusing on the control and eradication of illness. So she seeks a loan to pay the enrollment fees, tuition and graduation fees. She is confident that she will be able to obtain these benefits and can be a professional contributing to her field of work.

loans.use: to pay enrollment fees, tuition, and graduation fees.

loans.name: Simeona

texts.en:
Simeona is 46 years old. She is married and has three children. She is a hog raiser in her village and earns an unstable income. She hopes to improve her sales by ensuring good nutrition for her hogs. If she can give them enough nutrition, she will be able to offer them at a higher price someday. 

Simeona is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy feed and rice bran for her hogs. She hopes to generate a good profit for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and rice bran for her hogs

loans.name: Joesa

texts.en:
Joesa is thankful for the financial assistance she received in the past because it allowed her to buy greater quantities and varieties of groceries, toiletries and beverages to sell in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business lives.

She is applying for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy more items to sell. The more items displayed in her store, the better she does and the greater the profit she earns. The profits from her business will definitely help her meet her daily needs. She looks forward to this loan with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. Her goals for the future are to renovate her house and have her children finish their studies. She meets weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business, and she also draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and her religion, which she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study religion, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for groceries for her business.

loans.name: Gulzara

texts.ru: Гулзара, 39 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Образование - среднее. С 2004 года стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Бизнес Гулзара начала с 5,000 сом (KGS) и на полученную прибыль купила автомобиль для своей семьи. Благодаря непосильному труду и емкой работе, Гулзара достигла больших успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Гулзары имеется: 2 коровы, 6 телят. Также на собственной земельной доле мерою 0,30 Га, она выращивает картошку, кукурузу, яблони для реализации. По хозяйству помогают супруг и дети. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулзара обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 250 тюков прессованного сена для скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве и по возможности сделать дома ремонт.
texts.en:
Gulzara is 39 and married with three children. She has a high school education and started working in animal husbandry and agriculture in 2004. She started the business with 5,000 KGS and has bought a car for her family with the profits. Thanks to her constant effort and hard work, she has achieved great success in the development of her farm and is now receiving a monthly profit of 15,000 KGS. She currently has two cows and six calves as well as 0.3 hectares of her own land where she grows potatoes, corn and apples for sale. She runs the business with the help of her husband and children.

With the intention of further developing her business, Gulzara has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 KGS to purchase 250 bales of hay for her animals. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing her head count of livestock and, if possible, to do home renovations.

loans.use: to purchase 250 bales of hay as feed for her livestock

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en: Tasleem is 40 years old and lives in Lahore with her husband and three children. For many years, her husband has earned a living by running a barber shop and the equipment he uses is now quite old and needs to be replaced. He wants to do this, but his finances do not permit him to go out and buy the equipment without a loan. That is why Tasleem is requesting a loan her husband can use to buy items such as combs, a shaver, a mirror and a revolving chair. Tasleem hopes that this loan will increase her family's income and standard of living. She thanks Kiva lenders and Kiva's field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy equipment for a barber shop.

loans.name: Gulhayo

texts.ru: Гулхаё молодая и целеустремленная женщина. Ей 22 года. Она не замужем и живет с родителями и сестрами. Гулхаё после того как участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат, решила уверенно начать свой бизнес. Она хочет организовать бизнес переработкой косточки абрикоса. Она будет покупать косточки, перерабатывать и продавать ядро косточки. Гулхаё обратилась за займом в сумме 5000 сомони для покупки косточки, чтобы организовать бизнес. Ее мать будет помогать ей введению бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Gilhayo is a goal-oriented young woman. She is 22 years old. She is single and lives with her parents and sisters. After completing the Reach For Success course organized by the Businesswomen's Association and earning her certificate, Gilhayo firmly decided to launch her own business. She would like to start a business processing apricot seeds. She will buy apricot seeds, process them and sell the kernels. Gulhayo has applied for a loan in the amount of 5,000 TJS to stock up on apricot seeds and launch her business. Her mother will be helping her in managing the business. Gulhayo is requesting a loan in the amount of 5,000 TJS. She is counting on your kindness and hoping for your compassion.

loans.use: to buy apricot seeds for organizing new business.

loans.name: Ma. Theresa

texts.en: Ma. Theresa is a 44-year-old vegetable and fish vendor who lives in Ormoc City, Philippines. She is married, has five children and has been in her current line of work for more than 13 years. She supplements the income she earns here by raising hogs. Ma. Theresa has requested a loan to buy more vegetables and fish to sell in the market. This loan will help her improve her business and increase her income. Her goal for the future is to make her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and fish to sell in the market.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn wants to increase her income, and plans to do that by getting a loan she can use to buy more groceries to sell. She faces many obstacles, including the high cost of commodities and the school fees she has to pay to make sure her children get a good education. Her limited capital prevents her from buying more groceries without a loan, and that is why she has applied for a PHP 5,000 loan to buy canned goods, noodles, eggs, beverages, snack foods, seasonings, laundry soap and soft drinks to resell. With this financial assistance, she believes that can improve both her business and her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Danilo

texts.es: Don Danilo es un señor mayor que ha hecho grandes esfuerzos durante su vida para poder dar el sustento a su familia. Por lo que siempre ha buscado la manera de progresar, ahora el quiere poner una tienda de ropa y perfumería, así como vender diferentes productos para manualidades. Para esto requiere un préstamo de un millón de colones para comprar lo necesario e invertir en el local. Con este negocio espera poder seguir dando el sustento a su familia como lo ha hecho durante años.
texts.en:
Danilo is an older man who has made great efforts during his life to provide for the welfare of his family. He has always looked for a way to progress. Now he wants to start a clothing and perfume store, as well as sell different products for making crafts.

For this reason he is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 Colones to buy what is needed and invest in his store. With this business, he hopes to be able to keep providing for his family as he has done for years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Hajira

texts.en:
Hajira is a 58-year-old married mother of three daughters living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a welder and provides welding services in his community. 

Hajira owns a small business selling ladies' ready-made garments from home. She purchases clothing from the market at a low price, sews it and sells it for a higher price. The ladies of town like her garment selection a lot. The demand for clothes has increased because the winter weather has started and people are demanding warmer clothes. She has requested a loan so she can buy more varieties of garments to fulfill the demands of her customers.

Hajira's husband meets all the household expenses from his earnings, and she contributes her earnings only for savings. She hopes for a bright future for her children. Her dream is to provide a better education for them. She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more varieties of garments

loans.name: Cecile

texts.en:
Cecile is 29 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising cows in the Philippines. Cecile is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her cows.

Cecile has been raising cows for four years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her cow.

loans.name: Runa

texts.en:
Runa is a 50-year-old lady. She is married to Jagadish and lives with her husband and two sons in Dhupguri, in the district of Jalpaiguri.  

Jagadish is a farmer by occupation. He is 55 years old. His income is very inconsistent and low. Runa is an active and energetic woman. To increase her family's income, she started a milk business. She sells milk in her locality. Runa sells quality milk, which has a high demand from her neighbors. Through her hard work, she has achieved great success in her business. Now she wants to increase her business so that she can satisfy the demand of more customers. 

Runa wants to grow her business and income since the demand for milk is growing. Thus, she has turned to Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (Kiva’s partner) for a loan to buy an additional milch cow to expand her business. She plans to use the profits from the loan to further develop her business and to upgrade their mud- and straw-made house to a concrete-made one.

Runa is thankful to her lenders for their financial assistance.

loans.use: To purchase a cow to expand her dairy business.

loans.name: Allah Rakhi

texts.en: Allah Rakhi is 50 years old and the mother of one daughter and three sons. Her husband runs a tailoring shop in the local market which is the family's only source of income. He needs to buy a sewing machine and a variety of supplies for the shop, including thread, needles, and clothing. It's important that he do this to work efficiently and professionally. However, due to a lack of money he finds buying these supplies very difficult. Therefore his wife, Allah Rakhi, is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband buy the items he needs. Allah Rakhi is happy that she will be able to help her husband with a loan and is very grateful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan for their assistance.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her husband's tailoring work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to reinforce and plaster the walls of his home.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Crisanta works hard to support her family. She has a broom making business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Crisanta is borrowing 29,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) in order to buy raw materials for her broom making business.

Crisanta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her broom making.

loans.name: Shahida's Group

texts.en:
Shahida is a 48-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of six children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days, his rickshaw is not working properly and he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to purchase a new rickshaw as soon as possible. However, due to lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. Therefore, Shahida has requested a group loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. 

Shahida is so much thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a new rickshaw for her husband's transport business.

loans.name: Fabian Mauricio

texts.es: Fabian es un joven que desea ayudar económicamente a su familia, él es el único sustento para sacar adelante a su madre. El ha aprendido el arte de arreglar aparatos electrónicos, y ahora quiere poner un pequeño taller de reparación de máquinas de refrigeración, por lo que necesita un préstamo de quinientos cincuenta mil colones para comprar los materiales necesarios para poder realizar este trabajo. Con este préstamo el va a poder tener los ingresos necesarios para dar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en: Fabian is a young man who wants to help his family economically. He is the sole supporter of his mother. He has learned the art of electronic apparatus repair, and now he wants to open a small cooling unit repair shop, so he needs a loan of 550,000 colones to buy the needed materials to be able to do this work. With the loan he will be able to have the necessary income to then support his family.

loans.use: to buy materials to repair cooling units.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Doña Ana es una mujer emprendedora y madre de familia. Ella desea poner una tienda de venta de ropa y bolsos y de esta manera lograr un ingreso para su familia. Con el préstamo de un millón de colones ella va a invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios aprovechando que se acercan épocas festivas y así lograr vender todos los productos. Con el préstamo y la tienda va a generar los ingresos necesarios para así poder dar sustento a su familia.
texts.en: Ana is an entrepreneurial mother. She wishes to open a clothing and bag store to improve her family earnings. She will invest her loan in the purchase of the necessary goods and hopes to take advantage of the approaching holidays to sell of of the products. The loan and the store will generate the necessary income to support her family.

loans.use: to sell clothes and bags.

loans.name: Brenilda

texts.es:
Brenilda tiene 32 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Brenilda se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como gallos, gallinas, pollos, etc; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para comprar una mayor cantidad y variedad de animales, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Brenilda piensa incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender las diversas gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Brenilda is 32 years old, has 4 children and lives with her family in the rural area of the district of Oyotun, province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, north coast of Peru. The main economic activities in her community are agriculture, cattle raising and commerce. 

Brenilda works raising and selling animals, such as roosteres, hens, chickens, etc. She has more than 10 years of experience in this business, which is located at her home. She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity and variety of animals. This investment will allow her to have more productivity, which will influence positively her business. Brenilda intends to increase her animal stock to be able to satisfy the many tastes and needs of her customers in the region. This will allow her to increase her income, improve her profits and, therefore, her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity and variety of animals.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La señora Ana Doris de 44 años de edad casada , tiene un hijo que dependen de ella, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia,  y se dedica desde hace 13 años  a la venta de abarrotería hace unos 3 años.
Doña Ana  es una mujer muy emprendedora  que lucha día con día por tener una mejor vida. Que cambio de rubro hoy se dedica a la venta de golosinas, frescos y comida, sus clientes le prefieren por su atención y amabilidad.
Está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de frescos,  plátanos, papa, yuca, cebolla, tomates, pollo, repollo, salsa, leña, etc.  Que son la materia prima que necesita para atender mejor a sus clientes, está muy contenta de que  Prisma le dé la oportunidad de tener su segundo préstamo y  surtir su negocio, uno de sus sueños es tener su negocio más grande y que su hijo estudie en la universidad. 


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2014.
texts.en:
Ana Doris is 44 years old. She is married and has a dependent son. She lives in her own home in the community of San Lorenzo, southern valley of Honduras. She has worked selling groceries for 13 years.

Ana is an entrepreneurial woman that works hard every day to have a better life. Her customers like her because of her good service and courtesy.

She is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, plantains, potatoes, yucca, onion, tomatoes, chicken, cabbage, salsa, firewood, etc. She needs those products to better serve her customers. She is very happy that Prisma is giving her the opportunity to apply for a second loan to stock her business. One of her dreams is to have a larger business and for her son to go to university.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, October 2014

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, plantains, potatoes, yucca, onion, tomatoes, chicken, cabbage, salsa, firewood, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Deni

texts.en:
Meet Deni. Deni is married and lives with his wife and their three children in Cianjur, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede-Pangrango, West Java. 

Deni runs small stall where he sells snacks, drinks, fast-moving consumer goods, and mobile phone airtime to his customers. Deni was introduced to Ruma by one of his friends, and he quickly became interested in joining Ruma about a month ago because he wanted to increase his income. He is excited about his new business, which is selling mobile phone airtime to his community. 

As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide access to mobile services for his community by processing airtime transactions on the weekends. 

In the photo, Deni is in his small stall. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile services in his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles, cement and sand.

loans.name: Yean

texts.en:
Yean, who is 50 years old, is residing in Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She has four children in total; two are married, and two are single. 

To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business, growing rice and selling the crop to the local dealers. So far, she has been in this career for fourteen years. She can make a net profit of USD 3.00 per day, on average.  

Currently, Yean would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. She would like to thank all lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Denia Carolina

texts.es:
La señora Denia Carolina de 30  años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, vive en Nacaome al sur de Honduras  se dedica desde hace 5  años al negocio de venta de libretas, cuadernos, lápices, papel bon, folder, grapadoras, etc.
Doña Denia Carolina es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de papel bon, papel oficio, cuadernos de varios tipos y tamaños, lápices, etc. con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, espera trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y bien surtido y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Octubre de 2014.
texts.en:
Señora Denia Carolina is 30 years old, married, and lives with her husband and their children in the family's own home in Nacaome in southern Honduras. For the past five years, she has sold notebooks, pencils, copy paper, folders, staplers, and other office supplies. 

Señora Denia Carolina is an enterprising woman with ambitions to achieve progress, and strives each day to improve her family's quality of life. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of copy paper, legal-sized paper, various types and sizes of notebooks, pencils, and other office supplies. She expects that the investments that she'll make with this loan will boost her income and improve her situation. She also hopes to work with Prisma. 

Señora Denia Carolina's ambition is to have a solid, well-stocked business and achieve a better future for herself and her family. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras- October 2014.

loans.use: to purchase copy paper, legal-sized paper, notebooks, pencils, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 37-year-old married woman and is a responsible housewife. She is a hardworking and independent mother who is helping her family by providing services of tailoring at her home. She has been doing this for the past five years. 

She very well knows the techniques of stitching. She sews garments for the nearest factories; her husband brings cloth from the factory. She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan to buy a new Juki sewing machine because her previous sewing machine has become out of order, due to continuous work. Moreover, she wants to purchase a new Juki machine, which is useful for providing fast and more efficient stitching work. 

Shazia thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a Juki machine for sewing garments.

loans.name: Litoral Group

texts.es:
Nilfa es una mujer de 60 años de edad, soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 40, 35, 32 y 25 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de cena.
Ella es independiente, luchadora, constante, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en el barrio ‘plan 3000’, sitio que se ha convertido en un pujante brazo de producción donde microempresarios de todas las áreas, como la costura, el diseño y las artesanías, imitan productos extranjeros que se comercializan en los principales mercados locales, Los habitantes de la populosa zona son en su gran mayoría migrantes de otros departamentos del país como del exterior.
Nilfa es de tez morena, estatura baja, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español para el comercio (a la izquierda, polera verde y pantalón corto). Su vida la realiza sola porque sus hijos ya son grandes e independientes. Debido a la necesidad de expandir su negocio formó una banca de personas para solicitar un préstamo y prosperar en sus negocios. Su labor es la cocina, ella se dedica a la venta de cena ‘Patasca’ en un lugar al aire libre y sin rejas. Esta comida es un caldo que se prepara a base de maíz y cabeza de chancho resultado del intercambio cultural con la región andina, La palabra Patasca proviene del quechua “phataska” que se refiere al grano de maíz reventado al cocer y tiene la supuesta cualidad de curar resacas para seguir con la fiesta, con la singular forma de preparación de utilizar la cabeza entera del animal. 
Este es el segundo préstamo que solicita y sus 10 años de experiencia en este negocio avalan su esfuerzo y seriedad. Su sueño es construir un techo para beneficio de sus clientes. Ella desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra de sillas y mesas, una garrafa y víveres por mayor.
Es por esos motivos que Nilfa solicita un préstamo para la compra de mesas, Sillas y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Nilfa is a 60-year-old woman. She is single and has four children aged 40, 35, 32, and 25. She has a business selling dinners.

She is independent, feisty, persevering, understanding, responsible and hard-working. She works at the Plan 3000 neighbourhood, a place that has become a successful production centre where micro-entrepreneurs from every sector—such as sewing, design, and handicraft making—imitate foreign products that are sold in the main local markets. The inhabitants of the densely populated area are mainly migrants from other country's departments and foreigners.

Nilfa is short and has a dark complexion and long black hair. Her mother tongue is Guaraní and speaks Spanish when doing business. (In the picture, she is on the left side and is wearing a green T-shirt and shorts.) She lives alone because her children are grown-ups and independent.  

Owing to the need to expand her business, she formed a communal bank to request a loan and make the members' businesses prosper. She makes a living cooking and selling "patasca" dinners in an open space. "Patasca" is a broth made out of maize and pig's head, which is the result of the cultural exchange with the Andean region. The word "patasca" comes from the Quechua "phataska", which refers to the kernels of corn that open up when cooked. Because of the particular way of preparing it, by using the whole animal's head, it has the alleged quality of curing hangovers so as to be able to continue partying.

This is the second loan that she is requesting, and her 10 years of experience in this business attest to her hard work and reliability. Her dream is to build an awning to benefit her customers. She wants to expand her business by buying chairs, tables, a tank of propane gas, and food in bulk. For this reason, Nilfa is requesting a loan. She will use it to buy tables, chairs, and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and to expand her business.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 40 years old and married with four children, who are all in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jessica is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Jessica has been raising pigs for five years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe tiene 53 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado se su cónyuge y una hija mayor de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico un piso, Felipe y su cónyuge son nacidos en caserío el pueblo; viven en armonía familiar y en comunión con los miembros de su caserío, vive en la parte rural del caserío El Pueblo en el distrito de Santo Tomás; vive en una comunidad dedicada básicamente a la agricultura y ganadería, vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua. Dicho distrito está ubciado en la provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Felipe es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1,5 hectara. Variedad catimor, plantación tiene tres años de edad, esta en primer año de producción y para 2015 estará en segundo año de producción; tiene terreno agrícola propio donde esta parcela de café, actividad la realiza hace 03 años en caserío el pueblo lo hizo Distrito Santo Tomás, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café, producto lo vende en distrito santo tomas a compradores de la zona. Adicionalmente Felipe se dedica a la actividad pecuaria cría de ganado vacuno y también al cultivo y productos de pan llevar todo esto lo realiza en terreno propio en caserío el pueblo lo hizo distrito Santo Tomas.
