With the money she is requesting, she will purchase cement and sand to fabricate concrete blocks to sell from their workshop.  In the future she wants to build a big house for her family and purchase appliances.  She currently lives in precarious conditions, in an old home.  She was not able to attend school due to a lack of money, so her great challenge is to invest in professional training for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to make concrete blocks to sell from her workshop.

loans.name: Cremilda

texts.pt:
Senhora Cremilde tem 32 anos de idade, casada é māe de trés filhos dos quais dois estudam, frenquentando ensino primário, é negociante e vive em casa própria e  com a sua familia.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de sacos de amendoim para revender no mercado local.
No futuro espera construir um armazem de modo a vender os produtos a grosso e a retalho.
Vende produtos importados no pais vizinho e a oscilação de preços tem colocado  em causa o seu negócio, assim sendo fará sempre empréstimo de modo a ter retaguarda segura nos seus projectos.
texts.en: Cremilde is 32 years old.  She is married and has 3 children, 2 of whom are in primary school.  She is a merchant and lives with her family in a home she owns.  The amount she has requested will be used to purchase sacks of peanuts, which she will resell at the local market. In the future she hopes to build a warehouse so that she can sell products both wholesale and retail.  She sells products imported from the neighboring country and the ups and downs in prices have jeopardized her business, so she will always use loans to have  a safe backup plan for her projects.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of peanuts to resell in the local market.

loans.name: Segundo Felipe

texts.es:
Segundo Felipe tiene 53 años, su estado civil es casado, vive con sus hijos en edad post escolar en casa propia ubicada en Serur Guayaquil. Familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Segundo Felipe se dedica al servicio mototaxi en Cayaltí y alrededores y a la crianza de animales menores(patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros)en su casa. Además su esposa es docente nombrada y trabaja en un un colegio de Cayaltí. Destino de prestamo es compra de animales(chanchos, chivos, etc.) para negocio, para poder aumentar y diversificar su stock de animales, lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos. Ampliará su cartera de clientes, contando con clientes nuevos e ingresos adicionales a la familia. Dandoles de esta forma una mejora a su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo Felipe is 53 years old. He is married and lives with his children, who are past school aged, in his own house located in Serur Guayaquil. It is a close family. He lives in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture and ranching. It is located in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Segundo Felipe works in motorcycle taxi service in Cayaltí in the surrounding areas. He also raises small animals (ducks, turkeys, chickens, and more) at his house. In addition, his wife is a tenured teacher and she works in a high school in Cayaltí. The loan is for buying animals (pigs, goats, etc.) for his business. This way, he can increase and diversify and increase his livestock. This will allow him to increase his income. He will expand his clientele and have new customers and additional income for the family. This way, he will give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animals (pigs, goats, etc.) for his business to increase and diversify his livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Wilder Esneider

texts.es:
Wilder un joven de 19 años de edad que dedica sus mejores años de vida al trabajo a ser productivo a ayudarle a su madre pues así fue criado.
Aprendió de su trabajo gracias a que trabajo como ayudante con su tío con el que se copera y entre los dos sacan pedidos pero él tiene su empresa aparte y está consiguiendo clientes y ahora necesita un crédito para la compra de madera e impulsar más su negocio y que conozca la calidad y excelentes acabados.
Wilder sueña con que si negocio prospere, tener muchos empleados, apoyar incondicionalmente a su madre que ella no tenga que trabajar que todo lo tenga a la mano y aunque es joven tratara de hacerlo.
Pedimos a los prestamistas que apoyen a este joven emprendedor que busca a través del trabajo la mejor forma de superar la pobreza y la inequidad de su zona.
texts.en:
Wilder is a young man of 19 years of age who is spending the prime of his life working so that he can help his mother, because this is how he was raised. He learned his trade by helping his uncle and the two get orders together and Wilder also has a separate business and is getting customers. Now he needs a loan to buy wood and further boost his business. He understands quality and excellent finishes. 
Wilder dreams that his business will prosper and have many employees and that he will be able to help his mother to such a degree that she doesn't have to work but will have everything to hand. Although he is young, he is trying to do this.
We asked lenders to support this young entrepreneur who is looking to overcome poverty and inequality in his area through work.

loans.use: to buy wood to meet his orders and some that he has in partnership with his uncle. He is a 19 year old who works to help his mother.

loans.name: Hermenegildo

texts.pt:
Hermenegildo tem 24 anos de idade, casado e pai de um filho recem nascido,vive em casa dos pais.
O montante financiado será aplicado na compra de, cimento, areia, blocos, varrões, para iniciar a construção da sua casa visto que agora vive  em casa dos pais.
No futuro espera terminar a construção da sua casa e construir um estabelecimento comercial, de modo a aumentar a renda para melhorar sustento familiar.
O baixo salário não ajuda para a concretização dos seus planos, assim sendo vai fazer sempre que liquidar o empréstimo de modo a flexibilizar os seus projectos
texts.en: Hermenegildo is 24 years old.  He is married and has a newborn son.  He lives with his parents. The money he is requesting will be used to purchase cement, sand, concrete blocks and metal bars to start construction on his own home, as he currently lives with his parents.  In the future he hopes to finish construction and build a commercial establishment, so that he can increase his income and better support his family. His low salary isn't sufficient to achieve his goals, so he will use loans as a way to advance his projects.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, concrete blocks, and metal bars to start construction.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 45-years-old and married with four children. Alma works very hard to provide for them.

Alma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like snack foods, candies, biscuits, canned goods, soft-drinks, beers, etc. to sell.

Alma has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, candies, biscuits, canned goods, soft-drinks, beers, etc. 

Alma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like snack foods, candies, biscuits, canned goods, soft-drinks, beers, etc. to sell

loans.name: Alex Alain

texts.es:
Alex es un hombre humilde y trabajador que ha dedicado una parte de su vida al cuidado de su hijo y su esposa, vive en el municipio de Bello desde donde se gana la vida con un negocio de preparación y venta de mazamorra, un alimento a base de maíz muy popular y típico en Colombia.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente en los barrios del municipio y ya ha podido acumular una mediana cantidad de clientes.

Alex desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de una hornilla e insumos como maíz.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Alex is a humble and hardworking man who has spent part of his life caring for his son and wife. He lives in the town of Bello and makes his living through a business making and selling mazamorra, a corn-based dish (similar to rice pudding) that is very popular in Colombia.
He sells these dishes primarily in the neighborhoods of his town and has already built-up a moderate quantity of customers. 
Alex wants to increase the sale of his dishes and to work in a more comfortable way, so he is requesting a loan to buy a stove and for supplies such as corn. 
This loan will enable him to get ahead with his business and obtain the income he needs to keep sustaining his family.

loans.use: to buy a stove and corn to prepare a dish called mazamorra.

loans.name: Bella Norys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Bella una mujer de un gran corazón dedica al comercio de carbón un negocio que tiene en su hogar y que ella muy ingeniosamente exploto convirtiéndose en la única que oferta estos servicios, tiene su negocio en su hogar y siempre ha querido separarlos pues el carbón representa mucha contaminación y mal aspecto en su hogar. 
Bella tiene dos hijos de 18 y 7 años de edad es separada de su esposo y como cabeza de familia siempre se ha responsabilizado y enorgullecido que a sus familiares no les ha faltado nada.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de carbón ya que tiene buen contrato con empresas distribuidoras de este producto, estos contratos representan la mayor cantidad de ingresos y gracias a ellos pueden comer y dormir tranquilamente bajo el techo de su propio hogar. 
Bella quiere mejorar ser más ambiciosa conseguir más clientes y para ello necesitara más existencia de producto que es lo que busca con el crédito pues quiere salir de la pobreza, disfrutar de recursos que nunca tuvo y trabajara para cumplir ese sueño.
texts.en:
Bella is a big hearted woman who sells charcoal. She has the business in her home. She very ingeniously set it up and became the only person who offers this service. The business is in her home and she has always liked to keep it separate because charcoal causes a lot of pollution and makes her house look bad.    
 
Bella has two children, aged 18 and 7. She is separated from her husband and as head of household she has become responsible and proud of her family members lacking nothing.  

She is asking for a loan to buy charcoal because she has a good contract with businesses that distribute this product. These contracts are her biggest source of income and thanks to them she can eat and sleep in peace under the roof of her own home. 

Bella wants to improve and be more ambitious to get more customers. To do that, she needs more product and that is what she is seeking with the loan. She wants to get out of poverty and enjoy the resources she never had. She will work to make this dream come true.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to get better contracts for better income to help her get out of poverty.

loans.name: Julio Esau

texts.es:
Julio de 21 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, está estudiando en la universidad, vive en la casa de su madre: con él viven su mamá, su padrastro y un hermano de 11 años de edad que está estudiando 5°grado de educación básica.

Julio es empleado, trabaja en la alcaldía de su comunidad, estudia dos días a la semana y trabaja tres, de esta manera puede costear sus estudios y ayudar en su casa.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar una computadora, ya que es una herramienta muy importante para un estudiante y Julio la necesita para terminar su carrera universitaria. La meta de Julio es terminar su carrera universitaria para y trabajar duro para ayudar a su madre y algún día mantener su propia familia.
texts.en:
Julio, age 21, is single and has no children.  He is attending the university, and he lives in his mother’s house.  He lives with his mother, his stepfather, and an 11 year old brother, who is in the fifth grade.

Julio is an employee, and he works for the municipality.  He goes to school two days a week, and he works three.  This way he is able to pay for his education and help at home.

The loan will be used to buy a computer.  It is a very important tool for a student, and Julio needs it to finish his university degree.  Julio’s goal is to complete his university degree and to work hard in order to help his mother and to, someday, support his own family.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de experiencia, sabiduría y mucha paciencia.

Ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para salir adelante.

Ella tiene una pequeña chaza en la que vende frituras, golosinas y refrescos, adicional a esto trabaja en producción y venta de arepas que ella misma prepara en su casa. 

Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 7:00 Pm para tener sus productos listos y frescos para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.

Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y tener un gran avance de insumos e inventario de productos, por eso acude a un préstamo para comprar surtido de bebidas y frituras, refrescos, entre otros. 

Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda y buen corazón de las personas para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Rosa is an experienced, wise woman with a lot of patience. She has worked practically all of her life to get ahead. She has s mall stall where she sells fried food, snacks, and beverages. In addition, she makes and sells arepas that she prepares in her own house. 

She works every day from 5:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. to have her products ready and fresh for her customers. Most of them are residents of the area where she lives. 

She wants to capitalize her business and really advance with ingredients and product inventory. That is why she has turned to a loan to buy a selection of beverages and fried foods, among other things.

One of her main difficulties is a lack of money to invest in her business but she trusts in the help and good hearts of the people to get her activity ahead.

loans.use: to buy a selection of fried food, snacks and sodas to stock her business.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene works hard to support her family. Irene is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional box of fish to sell in the market.

Irene has been in this business for 25 years now.

In the future, Irene would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional box of fish to sell in the market

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Alma is 30-years-old and has three children who are currently in school.

Alma has a fishing business in the Philippines. Alma requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials like a fishing net, fish containers, gasoline, etc. for her business.

Alma has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Alma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like a fishing net, fish containers, gasoline, etc. for her business

loans.name: Ma. Lovella

texts.en:
Ma. Lovella is 39-years-old and married with two children, one of whom is in school.  Ma. Lovella works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Ma. Lovella has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future Ma. Lovella would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Adiel Guni

texts.es:
Adiel Guni tiene 21 años de edad, su estado civil es soltero y sin carga familiar, vive en casa familiar de sus padres de material rustico en el Caserío de Piedra, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz. Dicho caserío esta ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Adiel Guni es el serivicio de Mototaxi teniendo como recorrido Piedra del Toro-Morropon siendo conocido en la zona y alrededores. El destino del crédito es mantenimioento de unidad móvil, para asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo. Con la inversión le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que los pobladores de la zona estan trabajando en empresas exportadoras de banano, por lo que los transporta a su trabajo y escolares de la zona que van a estudiar a Morropón.
texts.en:
Adiel Guni, age 21, is single and does not have a family that he is responsible for.  He lives in his parents’ house, which is made of basic material, in the Piedra settlement.  The inhabitants of this place work in agriculture, in commerce, and with livestock.  It has basic services like water and electricity.  This settlement is located in the Morropón district and province in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

Adiel Guni’s business activity is providing service with a ‘mototaxi’ [three wheeled motorized vehicle].  His route is Piedra del Toro-Morropon, and he is known in the area and surrounding areas.

The loan is for maintenance of his vehicle in order to assure the correct functioning of his work tool.  The investment will help him to get improved income.

The market presents good prospects because the inhabitants of the area are working for a banana export company.  He takes them to their work, and he tranports students from the area who are going to school in Morropón.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To restore the stall.

loans.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Marco es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para atender su negocio de cría y venta de aves de corral en el municipio de Girardota. 

Este oficio lo inicio con el afán de generar unos mejores recursos para su familia.

El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de gallinas y pollos para su engorde y posterior venta.

Este préstamo es una gran oportunidad para el, pues podrá mejorar su vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
Working in the field is one of the most difficult jobs nowadays because of the great effort needed to make progress.  However, Marco is a man who has never given up in spite of any circumstances that can occur.  He is always ready to get resources for his family.

He gets up at the first hour in the morning in order to tend to his business of raising and selling poultry in the Girardota municipality.  He started this trade out of the desire to generate better resources for his family.

He wants to increase his working capital in order to guarantee the maintenance of his businesses.  That is the reason that brings him to request a loan to buy hens and chickens to fatten and later sell.  This loan is a great opportunity for him because he will be able to improve his life and his business.

loans.use: to buy chickens and hens.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es:
Florinda tiene 41 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos menores. Vive en casa propia junto a su conyuge, cuenta con servicios de luz y agua. Se encuentra a 5 minutos del centro Morropón. Cliente es natural de la zona. La comunidad de Morropon se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno y a la agricultura prinicpalmente al Arroz. Está ubicada en región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Florinda es la venta de productos de primera necesidad(arroz, azúcar, etc.), cerveza y otros, el negocio tiene más de 6 años de experiencia, tiene clientela ya establecida. Esposo se dedica a la agricultura donde siembra arroz y platano, además Florinda tiene 6 cabezas de ganado y un caballo. Ella solicita crédito para invertir en su tienda de abarrotes, cuya finalidad es aumentar y diversificar su stock para incrementar sus ventas, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Florinda is 41 years old and has 4 young children.She lives in her own house along with her spouse, and the house has light and water. It is 5 minutes away from the centre of Morropón. The customers come from the area. The community of Morropón works to breed cattle and to grow mainly rice. It is located in the Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Florinda mainly sells basic goods (rice, sugar, etc), beer and other drinks; the shop has been running for over 6 years, and already has loyal customers. Her husband works in agriculture, planting rice and bananas. Furthermore, Florinda has 6 heads of cattle and a horse. She is asking for a loan to invest in her grocery store, with a view to increase and diversify stock in order to increase her sales, improve her earnings and, ultimately, her quality of life.

loans.use: invest in her grocery store, with a view to increase and diversify stock.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge de 65 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida, dos hijos, un yerno y 3 nietos.  Él es un hombre que siempre se esfuerza por dar lo mejor a su familia,  apoyado en su negocio de venta de controles para televisor y aparatos electrónicos y lámparas de mano, gracias a lo que ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Jorge desea invertir en su negocio para surtirlo más y tener así mejores ingresos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en controles para aparatos electrónicos y lámparas de mano.
texts.en: 65 year-old Jorge lives in his own home along with his life partner, two children, a son-in-law and 3 grand-children. He is a man who always strives to give his family the best, through his shop which sells remote controls for televisions and electronic equipment, and flashlights. Thanks to this, he has been able to support his family. Jorge wishes to invest in his shop to stock it more and therefore have better income, which is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in remote controls for electronic devices and flashlights.

loans.use: to invest in remote controls for electronic equipment and flashlights.

loans.name: Laura Esther

texts.es:
Laura es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Medellín desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como almuerzos y desayunos típicos.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Laura y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Laura desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de fritadora y compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Laura is a humble and hardworking woman who has dedicated much of her life to raising a family. She lives in the municipality of Medellín, which is where she has developed spectacular cooking skills. In her business she prepares meals for delivery, such breakfast and lunch dishes typical to the area.  

Laura's primary customers are her neighbors, who recognize "the flavor of Laura" and know that they will always get delicious and well-prepared meals.

She hopes to increase her sales of these meals and to begin working in a more comfortable manner. For these reasons she requests a loan to purchase a fryer and other supplies necessary to prepare her recipes.

This loan will enable Laura to take her business to the next level and thereby earn enough money to have the opportunity to continue sustaining her family.

loans.use: to purchase a fryer and cooking supplies.

loans.name: Kellen

texts.en:
Kellen is a hard working lady, age 40, hailing from the village of Biharwe in Kashari Mbarara district. She is a widow and has a kiosk selling juice and water.

She has been an ardent customer of UGAFODE since 2003. She is so appreciative of the services because it has brought her a long way. She has managed to grow her business, pay tuition as well complete a residential house for her fatherless children.  Because of her trustworthiness and the loan of 3,000,000 UGX, which she previously received from Ugafode, her business grew to a bigger retail shop.  This enabled her to construct some houses which will help her get income to pay tuition for her growing children. She is therefore applying for this loan to complete her houses.

loans.use: To purchase cement, shutters and paint.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Tiene un almacén en el que vende productos de papelería como útiles escolares, productos de belleza, entre otros, etc. Inicio el negocio hace 7 meses y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

Ella desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser independiente y tener las razones suficientes para dedicarse en pleno a su negocio. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta como ropa y juguetería.

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de estas entidades que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.
texts.en:
Martha is a woman who is all set to face the world and have a full life thanks to her efforts.

She has a grocery store where she sells stationery such as school supplies, beauty products among other things, etc. She set up the business 7 months ago and despite its short time open for business, it has been well-received in the area.

She wishes to broaden the selection of products on offer, and improve her sales by injecting capital into her business, which is why she is asking for a loan to give herself the opportunity to be independent and have sufficient means to invest herself fully into her business.

The money will be invested in buying merchandise she does not currently have, such as clothes and toys.

She has high hopes for her business and thinks her future can improve considerably thanks to the support of these organisations which make it possible for people to dream of a better and more stable life.

loans.use: buy toys and clothes to stock her miscellanea shop.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija de 8 años de edad. Ella es pequeña comerciante de productos de belleza por catalogo. Tiene mucho tiempo de contar con este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más.   Blanca desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de la cocina dado que actualmente es de tierra y en invierno el suelo se humedece lo cual produce incomodidad y condiciones de insalubridad. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Blanca is 25 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and her 8-year-old son. She is a small business owner who sells catalog beauty products. She has been in this business for a long time and has many clients who prefer her more each day.

Blanca wants to improve the conditions of her kitchen floor. The floor is currently made of dirt and becomes very humid in the winter which is uncomfortable and produces unhealthy conditions. So she requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand and gravel to build a cement floor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to build a floor for her kitchen.

loans.name: Nhóm 02-Tây Sơn2-Phú Sơn3 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mười operates a small restaurant selling soup. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food to make soup to sell.

Mười is 43 years old and she is married with two children. Mười is the group leader of the Nhóm 02-Tây Sơn2-Phú Sơn3 solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Mười joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Mười has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Mười has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Mười faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In future, Mười hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more food to make soup to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizers.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Angelita is 36 years old and has four children who are in school.

Angelita has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Angelita has been in this business for four years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Edigina

texts.en:
Edigina is a married mother of two children, both of whom graduated from school and are working. They live at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For years, she has operated a food cafe business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of price fluctuation in her business. Edigina dreams of establishing a restaurant in the future. 

With the Kshs 50,000 she wants to purchase seats, three bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase seats, three bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and buy educational equipment for her daughter

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 60 years old and married with eight children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Merlyn is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Merlyn has been raising pigs for seven years and also earns additional income from weaving.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Felizardo

texts.es:
Felizardo tiene 42 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y dos hijos en edad escolar, Es natural del Caserío la Chamana de Distrito de Santo Tomas de Cutervo pero vive hace 20 años en distrito de Pimpingos, vive en casa propia de material rustico de dos piso; Felizardo mantiene buenas relaciones con los miembros su distrito, vive en un distrito pequeño dedicado básicamente a la agricultura y actividad pecuaria, Felizardo tiene buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona, vivienda cuenda con servicios de agua y luz; y está ubicada en el distrito de Pimpingos, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Felizardo es la agricultura hace 4 años, cultiva café variedad catimor, a la fecha de la visita él tiene 2 hectareas. Plantación de 3 años de edad, cultivo realiza en terreno propio en sector la laguna del distrito Pimpingos; Felizardo cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café; producto vende a comprador mayorista del distrito de Pimpingos. Adicionalmente cultiva producto de pan llevar los cuales comercializa en distrito Pimpingos los días domingos. El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento de dos has de café variedad catimor, con ello asegurará campaña 2015 con una mayor y mejor producción y por ende tener mayor ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Felizardo is 42 years old, has a stable home alongside his spouse and two school-age children. He is orginally from Caserío la Chamana in the Santo Tomas de Cutervo district, but he has been living in the Pimpingos district for the last 20 years in his own 2-floored house, made with rustic materials; Felizardo maintains a good relationship with the members of his district. He lives in a small district which works primarily in agriculture and farming. Felizardo has good personal and commercial references in the area, and his house has water and light; it is located in the Pimpingos district, in the Cutervo province, in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

Felizardo has been working for the last 4 years in agriculture, growing Catimor coffee; on the day he was visited he has 2 hectares. The plantation is 3 years old, and he harvests on his own land in the lagoon area of the Pimpingos district. Felizardo has experience in growing coffee; he sells his products to wholesale retailers in the Pimpingos district. Furthermore, he grows staple food products which he sells in the Pimpingos district on Sundays. The aim of the loan will be to care for his two hectares of Catimor coffee; this will set up the 2015 season with a greater and better production, and will ultimately enable him to have a better income to be able to have a better quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: care for 2 hectares of Catimor-variety coffee, which will set up the 2015 season.

loans.name: Benilda

texts.en:
Benilda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Benilda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, noodles, spices, etc. for her food production business.

Benilda has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Benilda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, noodles, spices, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 49 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosemarie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosemarie has been raising pigs for four years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Rowena is 35 years old and has four children who are in school.

Rowena has a general store business in the Philippines. Rowena requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, cigarettes, etc.

Rowena has been in this business for four years.  In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, cigarettes, etc.

loans.name: Cesilen

texts.en:
Cesilen is 33 years old and married with four children. With three of her children currently in school, Cesilen works very hard to provide for them.

Cesilen runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Cesilen has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, toothpaste, bath soap, milk, juice, hair conditioners, noodles, etc. 

In the future, Cesilen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Nelida

texts.es:
Nelida tiene 32 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, con su conyugue y sus 2 menores hijos de 13 y 6 años de edad de los cuales el primero cursa secundaria y el otro primaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucará. Nelida vive en el caserío desde hace 15 años. Vive en la parte rural del distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz. Dicho caserío esta ubicado en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza Nelida es la venta de cerveza contando con clientes de la zona, su esposo trabaja en la empresa OBREDECHT, el cual ayudará para poder cancelar el crédito sin ningun atrazo. El destino del crédito es para ivertir en su negocio surtiendo con nuevos productos como bebidas gaseosas entre otros, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.
texts.en:
Nelida is 32 years old. She lives in her own house made of rustic materials with her spouse and their two children aged 13 and 6 years old. The oldest is in Secondary school and the first in primary school at the National College of the district of Pucará. Nelida has lived in the village for 15 years. It is in the rural part of the district and has running water and electricity. The village is located in the Pomahuaca district, Jaen province, Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru. The people of her community work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

The work that Nelida does is selling beer, having clients in the area. Her husband works for the Obredecht company, which helps her pay off her loan with no problem. The loan will be used to invest in stocking her business with new products like soft drinks amongst others. With that she will generate greater revenues and be able to improve her quality of living. In her field there is no competition in the area so she gets good prices.

loans.use: to stock her store with new products like soft drinks amongst others.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.es:
Geraldine se dedica a la fabricación de bloques para la construcción, una actividad pesada pero que le ha permitido sobrevivir a través del tiempo y poder otorgarle una educación y alimento a su hijos.

Es una labor que atiente todos los días, pues la demanda de este elemento es muy alta.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como arena y aditivos para continuar con la fabricación de estos bloques.

Este préstamo le dará un impulso bastante grande a su vida y a su familia, pues tendrá un mejor capital para trabajar.
texts.en:
Geraldine makes construction blocks. It is an exhausting occupation, but it has allowed her to survive over time, and it has enabled her to provide an education and food for her children.

She works every day, as the demand for this element is very high. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials such as sand and additives, in order to continue fabricating these blocks.

This loan will help her and her family very much, as she will have better working capital.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as sand and additives for making construction blocks.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 46 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Wilma has been raising pigs for 20 years and also earns additional income from direct-selling Avon products. She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins.

Wilma is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream- to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins

loans.name: Vjollca

texts.en: Vjollca is not done yet with the repairing of their rundown family home, for this she needs your financial help again. Yet before you lend to her, she wants to thank all of you for your generosity and kind gesture. This time she wants to make some repairs to their washroom and also buy a washing machine. She is being photographed again with her grandchildren, who she deeply adores, as per her saying.

loans.use: To make minor repairs to their washroom and buy a washing machine as well.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy sheets of zinc, beams and rods to build a henhouse for egg-laying hens

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de hortalizas,  desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos necesarios como: abonos, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus siembras y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Manuel is 59 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He has worked in agriculture, especially growing vegetables for the past several years.. He sells his product in the different markets close to his home. He is requesting a loan to be able to buy inputs he needs like manure, fertilizer, pest control, etc. He also wants to improve the land shown in the photo to be able to continue with his planting and make more revenue.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pest control, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Nhóm 02-Trần Phú-Phú Sơn3 Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hà has a retail business selling dry food (salt, cooking oil, cake, etc.). Hà has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dry food to resell. Hà is 37 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 02-Trần Phú-Phú Sơn3 solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. The main harship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In 2012, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hà has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more dry food (salt, cooking oil, cake, etc.) to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 01-Thôn Hải - Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs Thủy operates a food stall selling fish. Thủy has been involved in this business for 7 years. The main hardship that Thủy faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to resell.

Thủy is 30 years old and she is married with 3 children. Thủy is the group leader of the Nhóm 01-Thôn Hải - Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. 

This is Thủy first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. 

With her business profit, Thủy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a door, a window, and to put a layer of cement on the floor of her house.

loans.name: Benjamin Edgardo

texts.es: Benjamín de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ladrillos, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes ya establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, Benjamín esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de tierra por mayor para hacer el barro, para poder elaborar el ladrillo y asi continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Benjamin, 31, lives in his own house with his wife and his two children.  He makes and sells bricks, and his business is at his place of residence.  He has many customers already established, and with what he earns from his sales, he is able to get ahead.  

Benjamin is requesting a loan for the bulk purchase of soil for making clay, in order to be able to make the bricks and continue with his work, which generates good earnings for him.

loans.use: to buy soil in bulk.

loans.name: Lý

texts.en:
Lý, a 47-year-old married mother of two, lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province. She has been  raising poultry and cattle for more than 10 years.

Lý's main hardships are having neither a clean water system nor a hygienic latrine. She is therefore requesting her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Lý hopes that she can build a new house; her other aspirations are for her business to continue doing well and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Edita

texts.en:
Edita is very thankful for her first Kiva loan since the purchase of computer made her teaching activity more attractive and interesting both for her and her pupils. 

Edita lives with her husband and two children in Vanadzor city of Syunik region. She has already been working at the school for five years as a teacher of mathematics. As she says she likes her both occupations; her work at the school and her private courses at her flat with her pupils, whom she helps to get prepared for the entrance examinations. 

This time Edita hopes to have this loan in order to furnish the room where she gives the courses to the pupils. With the help of this loan she plans to buy a big and large table with several comfortable chairs around it.

loans.use: to buy a big and large table with several comfortable chairs around it for her studying room.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a woman eager to get ahead. She is 53 years old, and lives with her family in the Eldoret area of Kenya. She is blessed with four children who are her greatest motivation in life to persevere, because she wants to provide them a better future. Mary was unable to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that her family faced. However, she never gave up and she has been practicing farming for the past 6 years. 

Mary always says, “I have always had an affinity for farming, and it runs in my blood.” Because of how much she likes farming she has even nicknamed one of her cows “Koroit” which makes her a very proud farmer, especially when she is milking her cow. Through her dairy cow, she is able to get between 10-15 liters a day, and this helps her support her family. 

Mary also practices crop farming, but she has not been making good profits because of poor farming implements and that is why she is kindly seeking a loan to buy animal feeds and farm implements. Through the loan, she will be able to buy high-quality animal feeds, good fertilizer and pesticides that she will use to greatly improve her crop production and dairy farming. Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques, and therefore using high-quality feeds and seeds will assure her of high milk production and a bumper harvest and hence, increased profit levels. 

Mary is very visionary, and her goal for the season is to boost her crop production and be able to get more crop output than the previous year. All this can be achieved through lenders’ help and goodwill. Mary believes that through the loan, she will turn around her family life and be able to give her child a solid educational background. This loan will be Mary’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: To buy animal feeds and farm implements.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is 39 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. She has been raising pigs in the Philippines for five years now.

Having received four past loans from NWTF to sustain her business, Eden has requested a new one for PHP 9000 to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 55 years old and has eight children. Rosalia is married and has two children who are in school.

Rosalia is in the agricultural business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rosalia has been for 5 years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosalia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Чумагул жительница северного района Спитамен. Она трудолюбивая, добрая, отзывчивая женщина. Ей 45 лет. Ее муж и сын находятся сейчас в России на заработках. Сама Чумагул на протяжении 10 лет занимается шитьем. В данный момент она хочет параллельно начать бизнес по откорму и продаже скотов, чтобы улучшить жизненные условия. В купле и продаже скотов Чумагулу будет помогать брат мужа. Чумагул планирует выращивать скот в течение месяца и затем продавать по прибыльной цене. Для того, чтобы закупить скот и корм для начала бизнеса, Чумагул не хватает собственного сбережения. Она обратилась за кредитом и надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Jumagul is a resident of the northern region of Spitamen. She is a hardworking, kind, responsible woman of 45. Her husband and son are currently working in Russia. For 10 years, Jumagul has been working as a seamstress, and the now wants to start a second business fattening and selling cattle in order to improve her living conditions. Her husband's brother will help her buy and sell the animals. She plans to raise them for about a month and then sell them for a profit. 

Jumagul doesn't have enough of her own money to buy cattle and feed to start her business. She is requesting a loan and hopes for financial support.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle and feed to start a new business

loans.name: Wassa Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre femmes du groupe Wassa vivent toutes dans des familles nucléaires. Elles ont en moyenne 32 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le village Cinzana gare de Ségou (4ème Région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté, mariage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le village. Elles font le petit commerce de grains de riz ; d’habillement et de condiment. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur  3eme cycle du prêt solidaire.
 Madame Bibata  (la 2eme  femme debout  de la gauche vers la droite dans la photo) est une grande vendeuse de grains de riz dans le village et ses environnants. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 3 sacs de grains de riz à Cinzana gara et à Ségou. La vente se fait au comptant et souvent à crédit au marché et à la maison à  une clientèle mixte.
 Madame Bibata  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen  de 35 000 FCFA avec ce prêt, qui sera utilisé pour des petites dépenses familiales  et augmenter également  son fonds de commerce. Elle souhaite continuer la collaboration  avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The four women of the Wassa group all live in nuclear families. They average 32 years of age with three children each, and they all live in the village of Cinzana Gare in Ségou (the Republic of Mali's fourth administrative region). They got to know each other as neighbors, relatives and through marriage, and through their income-generating activities in the village. They have small trading businesses selling rice grains, clothing and condiments. The group members decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso in order to expand their businesses and are on their third group loan cycle.

Bibata (who is standing second from the left in the photo) is a significant seller of rice grains in the village and its surroundings. She is planning to use her loan to buy three sacks of rice grains in Cinzana Gare and Ségou. She sells her goods for cash and often on credit at the market and from home to a mixed customer base.

With this loan Bibata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 35,000FCFA, which will be used for small family expenses and to expand her business. She would like to continue collaborating with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to buy rice grains.

loans.name: Nelson Yovany

texts.es: Nelson de 34 años de edad tiene desde hace varios años un chalet donde vende una variedad de productos como agua, gaseosa, jugos, golosinas, etc. su negoció esta ubicado en la orilla de la carretera y tiene muchos clientes, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Nelson, 34 years old, has had a small shop for several years. There he sells a variety of products, such as water, soda, juices, snacks, etc. His business is located on the side of a road and has many customers. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of more merchandise to continue with his work and so increase his income.

loans.use: to buy water, soda, juices, snacks, etc. wholesale

loans.name: Mohiston

texts.ru: Мохистон веселая, дружелюбная и гостеприимная жительница не большого района А.Джоми. Ей 56 лет. Она вдова. У нее четверо сыновей, трое из них находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации. Мохистон занимается животноводством. В Таджикистане большинство жителей занимаются сельскохозяйственными деятельностями. Мохистон более 10 лет работает на скотном дворе. У нее есть большой опыт в данной сфере деятельности. На данный момент у Мохистона не большое количество скотин и она хочет получить кредит, чтобы приобрети несколько голов телят и бычков. С такими планами она смело обратилась за кредитом. Мохистон целеустремленная женщина и надеется, что ей удастся достичь поставленных планов.
texts.en:
Mohiston is a cheerful, friendly and hospitable resident from the small A. Jomi region. She is 56 and a widow with four sons, three of whom are working in Russia. Mohiston has been working in animal husbandry for more than 10 years. The majority of people in Tajikistan work in agriculture and farming. She has a great deal of experience in this area. 

At the moment, Mohiston only has a few animals and wants to take out a loan to buy a few head of calves and steers. She has applied for a loan with this intention in mind. She is a purposeful woman and hopes that she will be able to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy calves and steers

loans.name: Hilarous

texts.en:
Hilarous is 40 years old. He is married and together with his spouse they have been blessed with two children of 12 and 8 years respectively. His spouse runs a hotel, hence provides additional income for the family.

Hilarous is a retailer of household goods, a business he has done for the last 13 years, earning a monthly income of KES 30,000. He has requested his first loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 30,000 which he will use to buy stock of household items like sugar, tea-leaves, rice and paraffin to sell. 

With the anticipated profits, Hilarous will be able to diversify his business further by buying a motorbike and getting involved in the transport business.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to expand his businesses further and to have his family live a better life.

loans.use: to buy a stock of household items like sugar, tea-leaves, rice and paraffin to sell.

loans.name: Nexar Teodoro

texts.es:
Nexar Teodoro tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente. Vive con su familia, cuenta con servicios públicos(agua y luz). Nexar Teodoro vive en el distrito de Morropon, desde hace 7 años. Los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado vacuno, agricultura especificamente de arroz. Dicho distrito está ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Nexar Teodoro es la carpintería fabricación de muebles, camas, puertas de madera. Actualmente tiene su taller en los alrededores de Morropón. Destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de insumos (madera) para un pedido grande que tiene. Con esta inversión Nexar Teodoro realizará el pedido y tendra mayores ingresos para su hogar, mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nexar Teodoro is 38 years old and has a life partner. He lives with his family and has utilities (water and electricity). Nexar Teodoro has lived in the district of Morropon for the last 7 years. 

The people there work in cattle-raising and agriculture, specifically of rice. Such district is located in the province of Morropón, in the Piura region, northern shore of Peru.

Nexar Teodoro works in carpentry making furniture, beds, and wooden doors. Currently, he has his workshop nearby Morropón. He will use the loan to buy supplies (wood) that he needs to deliver a large order. 

With this investment, Nexar Teodoro will cover the order and have more incomes for his home, improving his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies (wood).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Hermilina

texts.en:
Hermilina is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional fishing boat for her business.

Hermilina has been in this business for 10 years. Hermilina earns additional income from a general store.

Hermilina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an additional fishing boat for her business.

loans.name: Gatokarakura Group

texts.fr:
Chantal fait partie du groupe Gatokarakura  et  habite à Gitega. C’est une veuve de 38 ans. Elle a 4 enfants âgés de 8 à 15 ans, tous étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique(  riz, de farine de manioc,...) depuis 5 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de farine de manioc et de riz  à revendre  pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Chantal belongs to the Gatokarakura group and lives in Gitega. She is a 38-year old widow who has four children, aged between eight and 15 years old; all of them are at school.

Chantal has had a shop business (rice, cassava flour) for the past five years. This is her first loan from Turame and with this Kiva loan that she is being granted she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of cassava flour and rice, which she will resell to earn more money.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of cassava flour and rice to resell so she can earn more money.

loans.name: Geralyn

texts.en:
Geralyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Geralyn is 39 years old and has three children who are in school.

Geralyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Geralyn requested a PHP 12,500 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Geralyn has been in this business for 5 years. Geralyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Nahashon

texts.en:
Hello, world, and meet Nahashon. He is a progressive, hardworking, middle-aged Kenyan farmer from Ntima village. He lives together with his wife of 10 years and 3 children, youngest 5 and oldest 13. Nahashon counts himself lucky to have had a supported childhood. Born third in a family with 5  siblings, Nahashon managed to clear his primary education. He studied to years of high school education before having to drop out and help his family.
 
He started farming in 1997 on a 1.5 acre piece of run-down land with the help of his loving father. If you visit the farm today, you will find banana, vegetables, 6 goats, 15 hens and 25 trees. Not only is Nahashon concerned about the productivity of the land today, he is also worried about the changes in climate caused by human activities. He makes it up by planting more trees always. 

Nahashon is seeking a loan to purchase irrigation equipment for his farm. He is planning to expand banana farming but he can not count on steady rainfall. However, with an irrigation kit in place, he will be able to consistently supply water to his plants on regular basis. This will ensure the bananas grow green and healthy. This investment also reduces the risk of crop failure. 

Nahashon will use the income generated from this investment to pay for the school boarding fees of his 2 children. By always monitoring expenses and keeping a monthly budget, Nahashon also strives to bring financial stability into his family.

loans.use: to pay for irrigation equipment.

loans.name: Irongul

texts.ru: Иронгуль 57 лет. Она вместе с семьей проживает на районе Рудаки. Она не замужем. Иронгуль 14 лет своей жизни посвятила шитью женских платьев национального покроя. Она любит свою профессию не хочет ее менять, к тому же в Таджикистане трудно найти работу. Иронгуль в течение 14 лет работает портнихой у себя дома. Она принимает, заказы кроит и шьет все, у себя дома для нее такая работа является очень удобной. Иронгуль хочет продолжить свою деятельность, но из-за технических проблем швейной машинки она не может дальше принимать заказы на шитье. Иронгул просит кредит, чтобы приобрести швейные принадлежности новую машинку, но новая швейная машинка стоить дорого и Иронгиль надеется только на кредит.
texts.en:
Irongul is 57 and lives with her family in the Rudaki region. She is not married and has dedicated the past 14 years of her life to sewing women's dresses in the national style. She loves her profession and doesn't want to do anything else, especially since it's hard to find work in Tajikistan. Irongul has been running her sewing business out of her home ofr 14 years. She takes orders, cuts fabric and sews everything at her home, which is very convenient for her.

Irongul wants to keep her business going, but due to technical problems with her sewing machine she hasn't been able to take any orders. She is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine and other related items. A new sewing machine is expensive and she hopes for this loan.

loans.use: to buy fabric and a new sewing machine

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
El socio Felix continua dedicándose a la agricultura y ganadería, el socio  cultiva trigo,  papa, tubérculos, entre otros, él socio lleva años dedicándose  a esta actividad el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de eta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “Apu Asangani” 
El socio agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
The partner Felix continues making a living from farming and animal husbandry. He cultivates wheat, potatoes and tubers, among others. He has been making a living from this activity, in which he does well thanks to the efforts that he puts every day in this business. He wishes to continue working so as to continue helping his family.

The partner requested the loan for the purchase of fertiliser and seeds. He belongs to the “Apu Asangani” community bank. He is grateful and values the loan, and promises to pay his monthly dues with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and seeds

loans.name: N’Fah Dit Amadou

texts.fr: Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU est né en Décembre 1966 à KOLONA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la 3ème Région administrative du Mali. Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU est âgé de 48 ans avec 10 enfants dont 4 filles. Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU réside à BOUGOULA dans une famille traditionnelle. Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU s’est vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat et vente d’essence. Sa vente se fait à BOUGOULA. Fort de  ses 3 années d’expérience dans le domaine, il collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  troisième prêt. Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 2 barils d’essence et 1 baril de gasoil. Il s’approvisionne à KOLONDIEBA, il effectue ses ventes au comptant  et parfois à crédit à une clientèle mixte. Mr N’FAH dit AMADOU espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50 000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en: N'fah dit Amadou was born in December 1966 in Kolona in the Kolondieba circle, one of the prefectures of Mali's third administrative region. He is 48 years old and has ten children, four of whom are girls. N'fah dit Amadou lives in Bougoula in a traditional family and he developed an early interest in income-generating activities, notably the purchase and sale of petrol. He sells his fuel in Bougoula. With three years' experience in this field, he is collaborating with Soro Yiriwaso to expand his business so he can satisfy the demand of his ever-growing customer base and he is on his third loan. He plans to use his loan to buy two barrels of petrol and one barrel of diesel oil. He gets his supplies in Kolondieba and sells for cash and sometimes on credit to a mixed customer base. N'fah dit Amadou hopes to make an average monthly profit of 50,000FCFA, which will be used to provide for his family's needs and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy fuel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition for her youngest son

loans.name: Gumamwo Group

texts.fr:
Joachin fait partie du groupe Gumamwo et  habite à Gitega. Il est marié à Malvine une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants  âgés de 8 à 15 ans, dont 3  étudient.

Il fait le commerce d'essence depuis 5 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité d’essence  à revendre  pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Joachin belongs to the Gumamwo group and lives in Gitega. He is married to Malvine who is a trader, and together they have five children, aged between eight and 15 years old; three of the children are at school.

Joachin has been selling petrol for the past five years and this is his first loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan he is granted, he is going to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of petrol which he will resell to earn more money.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of petro to resell so he can earn more money.

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is 30 years old, married, and has been blessed with 4 children. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past 5 years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables like wheat flour, rice, and cooking oil. She cites theft and competition as the major challenges in her business. 

Khadija is requesting a 40,000 KES loan to boost her kiosk's inventory. With the loan she will purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat and oil. 

Khadija dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat and oil

loans.name: Jelma

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Jelma works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from electronic mobile load retailing. Jelma is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Jelma has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Aneesa

texts.en: Aneesa is a 42-year-old separated woman who has been depending on herself by running her own business sewing sofa covers and selling them for six years. She is planning to open her own sewing workshop in the future. Now she needs to buy a machine that will help her in making designs for the covers so that she will add variety to her products, but because she doesn’t have enough money to buy the machine, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy a machine that will help her in making designs for sofa covers.

loans.name: Ibadat

texts.ru: Ибадат 62 года, вдова, мать 3 детей. У Ибадат - средне-специальное образование, с 2000 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Ибадат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 5 коров, 20 овец, 4 теленка. Ежедневно Ибадат продает молоко местным жителям. Экологически чистая и вкусная сельскохозяйственная продукция Ибадат пользуется большим спросом, принося ежемесячный доход около 3,000 сом (KGS). Однако этих средств катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь, Ибадат сейчас живет с внуком, он не работает, так как недавно вернулся из армии, однако с удовольствием помогает Ибадат по хозяйству. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Ибадат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 телят, для увеличения поголовья скота, что в будущем поможет улучшить материальные и жилищные условия Ибадат.
texts.en:
Ibadat is 62 and widowed with three children. She has a specialist high school education and has been working in animal husbandry since 2000. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has five cows, 20 sheep and four calves. Every day she sells milk to local residents. There is great demand for her organic and flavourful farm products, which bring in a monthly income of about 3,000 KGS. 

However, this income doesn't come close to covering her living costs. Ibadat is living with her grandson, who doesn't work because he recently returned from the army, though he gladly helps her with the farm. With the goal of further developing her business, Ibadat has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase four calves to increase her head count of livestock, which in the future will help her improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase four calves for fattening and resale in order to increase her income

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Шахноза. Ей 29 лет. Она очень веселая и жизнерадостная девушка. Шахноза всегда ценит в людях доброту и хорошее настроение. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Шахноза с семьей проживает на районе Рудаки. Шахноза занимается шитьем национальной женской одежды. Шить и кроить она научилась у свекрови. Шахноза самостоятельно берет заказы и шьет более трех лет, но по сей день прислушивается к советам свекрови с большим стажем. 
  Причина, по которой Шахноза обратилась за кредитом, является нехватка средств на покупку новой швейной машинки. Ее швейная машинка совсем устарела и не выполняет работу хорошо как раньше. Шахноза приняла решение купить новую швейную машинку, чтобы ей было легче работать и создать хорошие условия для работы. Поддержите Шахнозу.
texts.en:
This is Shahnoza. She is 29 and a very cheerful and happy young woman who values kindness and a good disposition in people. She is married and has two children. She and her family live in the Rudaki region. She works as a seamstress sewing women's clothing of the national style, a trade she learned from her mother-in-law. She has been taking orders and sewing independently for more than three years, though she still depends on the advice of her mother-in-law. 

The reason Shahnoza is requesting a loan is because she doesn't have enough of her own money to purchase a new sewing machine. Her current one is very old and doesn't work as well as it used to. She decided to buy a new sewing machine so it will be easier and more comfortable for her to work. Please support her.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 21-year-old single man who has been employed in a factory for six years to cover his needs and expenses. 

Despite his low financial situation, he is determined to continue his education, so besides his work in the factory, he is now acquiring a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua to pay his university's tuition fees.

loans.use: to pay his university's tuition fees

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 02 hijos dependientes, vive con sus hijos y su conyugue. Cesar vive en el caserío de Yambolon en el distrito de Pomahuaca, el caserío de Yambolon es un caserío mediano con aspiraciones a superarse, en dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería. Dicha comunidad esta ubicada en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Cesar se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café, de 05 y 06 años de edad, cuenta con fincas fruteras de café en buen estado, Cesar además se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno así cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el rubro de la agricultura, además él se dedica al cultivo de pan llevar como son yuca, frejol, etc. los cuales son para su consumo, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales, el destino del crédito es para invertir en el negocio mantenimiento de su cultivo de café lo que asegurará tener una excelente cosecha para el 2015. Invirtiendo en su negocio y poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cesar is 36 and lives with his wife and 2 dependent children in a hamlet called Yambolon in the Pomahuaca district. Yambolon is medium-sized hamlet but is growing. In this area, most of the work is in farming, trade and livestock breeding. This community is located in the Pomahuaca district of the Jaen province which lies in the Cajamarca region of the northern highlands of Peru. 

Cesar makes a living farming and also has coffee plants which are 5 and 6 years old. Fortunately, his coffee plantations are in a good condition. Cesar also raises cattle which means in total he has more than 10 years of experience working in farming. He also grows other local crops likes yucca and beans etc for his own consumption. He has very good personal references and he will use use the loan to invest in his business by carrying out maintenance on his coffee crops to make sure he has an excellent harvest in 2015. By investing in his business he'll be able to make a decent enough profit to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in his business by carrying out maintenance on his coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of materials such as leather and insoles, and similar items.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred, an aging, hardworking man of 50, hails from the village of Bubare Nyabushozi in the Kiruhura district of Uganda. He grew up without his parents: both of them died when he was very young. He was brought up by his grandmother, who died when he was 15 years old. 

Fred worked on people’s farms, looking after their goats. Because of his trustworthiness, he was given five goats as a gift, which laid a foundation for his success. 

He has looked after these goats and seen them multiply to a herd of 60, which he used to be able to marry and acquire land for his banana plantation. 

Now that banana farming is booming in Mbarara and in Uganda at large, he is applying for a loan of 5,000,000 Uganda shillings to expand his plantation.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers and hire labour to plant banana plants

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 43 years old and married with three children. One of her children is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Wilma runs a business buying and selling coconut wine in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock of coconut wine to sell.

Wilma has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Wilma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Xhemal

texts.en:
Xhemal does agriculture/livestock to earn a living. He is requesting this loan to pay for the rent of some agricultural land and prepare the soil for planting. He sells the agricultural fresh produce to whole buyers and the raw cow milk to some dairy farms in the vicinity of their home. Onions, apples, chestnuts and medicinal plants, in particular, have been in his focus since the start of his activity. Xhemal also produces and sells some seasonal vegetables, but in smaller quantities.

Xhemal is 55 and married and has two children with the youngest one being just shy of 15. They live in a village situated along the national road, Tirana-Korca, that has a very tough climate; very snowy and bitter cold. The products that have made Xhemal’s village known are beans and red onions.

loans.use: to pay for some agricultural land he is renting and also do some soil preparation for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition and to purchase educational equipment for her son

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 25 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Geraldine works very hard to provide for her family.

Geraldine runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items, such as eggs, canned goods, detergent, shampoo and candies.
 
She has requested a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy additional items to sell, like eggs, canned goods, detergent, shampoo and candies.

Geraldine would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, like eggs, canned goods, detergent, shampoo and candies.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is 53 years old and married with seven children. With five children still in school, Linda works very hard to provide for them.

Linda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like eggs, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits, candies, etc. to sell.

Linda has been in this business for 19 years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits, candies, etc.
